# Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly Request for Proposal
### Contract Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a tender for the supply of Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly, consisting of a waterproof tail cap and waterproof ST07 remote tape switch.

## Contract Information
* **Contract Title**: Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly
* **Contract Number**: 202305063
* **Contract Closing Date**: May 24, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date**: June 12, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: December 12, 2023

## Tender Description
The RCMP requires a quantity of 1425 Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly for delivery to the RCMP Armourer Section in Regina, Saskatchewan.

## Award Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price. The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## Terms and Conditions

* Delivery is requested within 30 calendar days of the contract award date.
* Substitute products will not be considered.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities.

## Additional Information

* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* Procuring Office: Trina Nurse, Senior Procurement Officer, RCMP, 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R2.
* Contact Information: Trina.Nurse@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

## Procurement Strategy

* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.
* Having a business profile in the IBD will increase your company’s visibility and may provide additional business opportunities.
* The IBD can also allow you to compete for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

## Attachment

Attachments to this notice include:
* Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly – Request for Proposal (EN)
* Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly – Notice of Proposed Procurement (FR)
* Surefire UE07 Switch Assembly – Additional Attachments (EN and FR)
